title: Stary Sad
description: Bronze and Iron Age burial ground in the Baraba forest-steppe containing 75 burials of the Pakhomovka culture (late second millennium BCE), plus additional burials from the Andronovo culture (ca. 2200-900 BCE) and Sargat culture (ca. 500-250 BCE).

properties.description: Point representing the Google Satellite Imagery location of the Staryi Sad necropolis, after Molodin et al. 2017.
properties.title: Imagery location of Staryi Sad
